platform.title: Stampcoin Platform
platform.subtitle: Digital Platform
platform.description: An innovative blockchain-based platform for digital stamps, rewards, and loyalty tokens. Secure peer-to-peer transfers and a marketplace for digital collectibles powered by transparency and community trust.

wallet.title: Digital Wallet
wallet.description: Secure storage and management of your digital stamps and tokens with blockchain technology

transfers.title: Secure Transfers
transfers.description: Blockchain-powered peer-to-peer transactions with complete transparency and security

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy, sell, and trade digital collectibles in a trusted community marketplace

profiles.title: User Profiles
profiles.description: Verified accounts with complete profile management and collection tracking

businessPlan.title: Business One-Pager
businessPlan.description: Complete business plan in multiple languages
